Method Detail

getLocation

public GeoData getLocation(String photoId)
                    throws IOException,
                           FlickrException,
                           org.json.JSONException
Get the geo data (latitude and longitude and the accuracy level) for a photo. This method does not require authentication.

Parameters:
photoId - reqired photo id, not null
Returns:
Geo Data, if the photo has it.
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException - if photo id is invalid, if photo has no geodata or if any other error has been reported in the response.
org.json.JSONException

getPerms

public GeoPermissions getPerms(String photoId)
                        throws IOException,
                               FlickrException,
                               org.json.JSONException
Get permissions for who may view geo data for a photo. This method requires authentication with 'read' permission.

Parameters:
photoId - reqired photo id, not null
Returns:
the permissions
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException - if photo id is invalid, if photo has no geodata or if any other error has been reported in the response.
org.json.JSONException

                    throws IOException,

                           org.json.JSONException
Removes the geo data associated with a photo. This method requires authentication with 'write' permission.

Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException

setLocation

public void setLocation(String photoId,
                        GeoData location)
                 throws IOException,
                        FlickrException,
                        org.json.JSONException
Sets the geo data (latitude and longitude and, optionally, the accuracy level) for a photo. Before users may assign location data to a photo they must define who, by default, may view that information. Users can edit this preference at flickr. If a user has not set this preference, the API method will return an error. This method requires authentication with 'write' permission.

Parameters:
photoId - The id of the photo to cet permissions for.
location - geo data with optional accuracy (1-16), accuracy 0 to use the default.
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException

setPerms

public void setPerms(String photoId,
                     GeoPermissions perms)
              throws IOException,
                     FlickrException,
                     org.json.JSONException
Set the permission for who may view the geo data associated with a photo. This method requires authentication with 'write' permission.

Parameters:
photoId - The id of the photo to set permissions for.
perms - Permissions, who can see the geo data of this photo
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException

batchCorrectLocation

public void batchCorrectLocation(GeoData location,
                                 String placeId,
                                 String woeId)
                          throws IOException,
                                 FlickrException,
                                 org.json.JSONException
Correct the places hierarchy for all the photos for a user at a given latitude, longitude and accuracy.

Batch corrections are processed in a delayed queue so it may take a few minutes before the changes are reflected in a user's photos.

Parameters:
location - The latitude/longitude and accuracy of the photos to be update.
placeId - A Flickr Places ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
woeId - A Where On Earth (WOE) ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException

                            String placeId,
                            String woeId)
                     throws IOException,
                            FlickrException,
                            org.json.JSONException
Parameters:
photoId - Photo id (required).
placeId - A Flickr Places ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
woeId - A Where On Earth (WOE) ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException

setContext

public void setContext(String photoId,
                       int context)
                throws IOException,
                       FlickrException,
                       org.json.JSONException
Indicate the state of a photo's geotagginess beyond latitude and longitude.

Note : photos passed to this method must already be geotagged (using the setLocation(String, GeoData) method).

Parameters:
photoId - Photo id (required).
context - Context is a numeric value representing the photo's geotagginess beyond latitude and longitude. For example, you may wish to indicate that a photo was taken "indoors" (1) or "outdoors" (2).
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException
